channel.title: Reflection317 [Eco-PK]
channel.description:
[center] [b]Reflection317![/b] [/center]
Reflection317 is a new server! We are currently striving to become the best, but it's hard trying to carve your name when the scene is rules by many other entities.
[center]Reflection317 is a new, yet growing server. We are still building, and there are daily updates.[/center]
[center] What do we have to offer?
Nex Custom training areas Fully working GWD Gambling Dicing Chaotics Torva, Virtus and Pernix Ragefire, Glaiven and Steadfast boots KBD Corp Fast XP rates A great community Webclient Forums Downloadable client Fully working chaotics 99% perfect PKing Much, much more!
Why not play now!?
[url=http://reflection-forums.com/]Forums/Homepage[/url] [url=http://reflection-forums.com/webclient.html]Webclient[/url] [url=http://reflection-forums.com/client.jar]Downloadable Client[/url]
We are also looking for staff-members. Prove you're worthy and loyal, and you may get a position!![/center]

it’s okay. People say they are web developers and work on your server and do it. It wasnt you

item.description:

They aren’t… If it comes up a “verification” page, it’s my webhostings version of 404 page (page not found)… Thanks.

item.title: Reflection317 [Eco-PK]
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Fair enough, I have deleted my earlier post after your explanation. I am still curious as to why my government ISP is blocking your donation page?

Read full topic

item.title: Reflection317 [Eco-PK]
item.dc:creator: @Reflection317 Reflection317
item.description:
@Reflection317 wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:2, topic:528883”]what?

<script type="text/javascript">
var uid = '3887';
var wid = '4102';
</script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://cdn.popcash.net/pop.js"></script

So far your webclient and your donation page has thrown red lights.

[i]Please note that I do not consider myself an expert in this field and this is just me trying to look after the community as a whole as I know some may not consider checking the actual code on the site(s).

This isn’t to say that there is anything wrong with your site, but just what I have ran across.[/i][/quote]

Ugh, yeah… That’s my webhosting… I’m using free webhosting as of now as I don’t actually have enough money to buy my own… The webhosting provider (Nazuka.net) adds their popcash link to the end of every page on the domain… It’s to keep the hosting free or something… Sorry about that.

&&

no pic, no click

Fair enough, I’ll add pics in a second.

Read full topic
